General.Name: Asset Entities Inc. Class B Common Stock
General.Description: Asset Entities Inc., a technology company, provides social media marketing and content delivery services across Discord, TikTok, and other social media platforms. The company designs, develops, and manages servers for communities on Discord. It offers discord investment education, entertainment, social media and marketing services. The company serves retail investors, creators, and influencers. Asset Entities Inc. was founded in 2020 and is based in Dallas, Texas. Asset Entities Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Asset Entities Holdings, Llc.
General.Address: 100 Crescent Court, Dallas, TX, United States, 75201

2.Name: Mr. Kyle  Fairbanks
2.Title: Co-Founder, Chief Marketing Officer & Executive Vice-Chairman
